ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 232
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, i have a suggestion, dont solo.... Soloing is good for a while, but you need to realize that the objective of this game is not to really solo but to find
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, i have a suggestion, dont solo....
Soloing is good for a while, but you need to realize that the objective of
this game is not to really solo but to find a well rounded group, and do
your part.
your part includes and does not include:
1) you are NOT a tank! there is no need for you to do any sort of hand to
hand combat!.... EVER!!! if your tank says ""RUN"" dont even think twice
about it. get your ass outta there!
2) you ARE crowd control (Mezmerization, Color Flux, Memory blur....these
are your specialties, learn how to use these, and people will love you.....i
have held off a train of about 12 mobs, while my group killed them off one
at a time.......you must communicate with your group, and tell them, if a
train comes, all assist <tank> this was all the mobs wont even move, cept
the one they are attacking. all you need to do, is keep casting Mezz about
once every 15 seconds)
3) you are a Buffer (buff your tanks, give them speed, str, and other stuff)
4) you are a debuffer (weaken, and slow down your enemies, this will help
your tanks live longer)
Everyone loves enchanters, we help people live during major combat
situations......
remember your role, and live it.
if you wanna do hand to hand combat, and solo, be a Tank, not an enchanter.
or if you wanna solo the wholel game, be a Necro hehe.

-Aeramus Brainblaster Level 36 (for too long)
Bristlebane server


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jenni [mailto:freya@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 24, 2000 9:38 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 232
>
>
> From: Jenni <freya@...>
>
> I think for now I'm going to stay in Guk, or Rathe Mtns. Both zones are
> rarely
> crowded, and the lower level mobs that I can kill are rarely camped. I'm
> getting sick of the crowded zones. Befallen is OK, but it seemed a bit
> crowded
> for me. My only experience with Najena was when I zoned in and ended up
in
> a
> room full of magicians and pets and promptly got killed and almost lost my
> corpse for good. I do want to go there in a few more levels though.
>
> Question about Soloing: Now that I'm 16 it's been very difficult for me
to
> solo, even with a pet. My new level 16 spells use tons of mana, and I end
> up
> either running out before I kill the mob, or coming very close to it.
> Either
> way I end up medding and healing for a long time between kills. It hardly
> seems
> efficient. Any suggestions on soloing at level 16?
>
> -Ezrae
> 16th level DE Enchantress
> Brell Serilis
>
>
> Andrew Collins wrote:
>
> > From: Andrew Collins <ACollins@...>
> >
> > Gossimer armor can be found in Unrest, rarely in Runnyeye, but 2 good
> spots
> > to find gossimer are Befallen and Najena. However it isnt as easy as
guk.
> >
> > Im glad to see someone appreciates Upper Guk... I loved that place and
> Lower
> > as well...
